meanings.definition: A person who speaks or acts in a sarcastic or mocking manner.
meanings.sent1: The wisenheimers in the class always made jokes during the lessons.
meanings.sent2: The wisenheimers at the party kept teasing each other playfully.
meanings.sent3: The wisenheimers in the movie theater whispered snarky comments about the film.
meanings.sent4: Her friends were wisenheimers, always poking fun at each other's quirks.
meanings.sent5: The wisenheimers in the comedy club had the audience roaring with laughter.
